pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.5: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.8: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:1.14.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:2.1.10: nahāyati. Payoge dukkaṭaṁ, nahānapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
